entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late in the evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
